publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5780 Lewis Macdonald: First Group Secures Contract for the 2012 London Olympicsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen-based First Group on its successful bid to provide buses and coaches to transport spectators during the 2012 London Olympics; understands that so far 18 other Scottish companies have won contracts from the Olympic Delivery Authority, and looks forward to further Scottish businesses benefiting from Britain hosting the games.
